meta.content: Front Page; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

block.p: On Deck in Japan American baseball teams may bid up to $10 million for the rights to pursue Ichiro Suzuki, a good-hitting outfielder from Japan.
PAGE D1

Lazio Removes a Radio Ad Rick A. Lazio removed an advertisement that criticized Hillary Rodham Clinton for supporting a treaty on global warming, and their dispute over Muslim-American support for her campaign deepened.
PAGE B1

Auto Sales Level Off Sales of new cars and light trucks were flat last month, and bloated inventories of unsold vehicle models have led to a weeklong closing of eight of the nation's 55 auto assembly plants.
PAGE C1

Taiwan Jet Crash Inquiry Investigators interviewed the captain and recovered two crucial data-recording boxes from a Los Angeles-bound Singapore Airlines flight that crashed in Taiwan during takeoff, killing 79.
PAGE A8

An Intramural Budget Battle Republicans in the House and the Senate, unable to reach agreement with the White House on crucial end-of-year spending issues, were themselves at odds over exactly what to do next.
PAGE A18
Pirro Sentenced to Prison Albert J. Pirro Jr., the influential businessman and husband of Westchester County's top prosecutor, was sentenced to 29 months in federal prison for tax evasion.
PAGE B1
New TV: Same Old Same Old In TV shows from ''Bette'' to ''Madigan Men,'' stars are not creating new characters but stepping into roles that exude familiar personalities.
THE ARTS, PAGE E1
On Deck in Japan American baseball teams may bid up to $10 million for the rights to pursue Ichiro Suzuki, a good-hitting outfielder from Japan.
PAGE D1

Lazio Removes a Radio Ad Rick A. Lazio removed an advertisement that criticized Hillary Rodham Clinton for supporting a treaty on global warming, and their dispute over Muslim-American support for her campaign deepened.
PAGE B1

Auto Sales Level Off Sales of new cars and light trucks were flat last month, and bloated inventories of unsold vehicle models have led to a weeklong closing of eight of the nation's 55 auto assembly plants.
PAGE C1

Taiwan Jet Crash Inquiry Investigators interviewed the captain and recovered two crucial data-recording boxes from a Los Angeles-bound Singapore Airlines flight that crashed in Taiwan during takeoff, killing 79.
PAGE A8

An Intramural Budget Battle Republicans in the House and the Senate, unable to reach agreement with the White House on crucial end-of-year spending issues, were themselves at odds over exactly what to do next.
PAGE A18
Pirro Sentenced to Prison Albert J. Pirro Jr., the influential businessman and husband of Westchester County's top prosecutor, was sentenced to 29 months in federal prison for tax evasion.
PAGE B1
New TV: Same Old Same Old In TV shows from ''Bette'' to ''Madigan Men,'' stars are not creating new characters but stepping into roles that exude familiar personalities.
THE ARTS, PAGE E1
